entities: Security Council Committee established pursuant to resolution 918 (1994) concerning Rwanda
Group of Experts established by resolution 1533 (2004)
summary: The Security Council, recalling previous resolutions on Rwanda, considered reports from the Committee established pursuant to resolution 918 (1994) and a letter from Rwanda's Permanent Representative requesting termination of measures imposed by paragraph 11 of resolution 1011 (1995). The Council decided to terminate, with immediate effect, the measures imposed by paragraph 11 of resolution 1011 (1995). The Council also decided to remain actively seized of the matter.
